column4: Classic British dessert in smoothie form! Best of all? We keep the crunch. Get in.

column4: Q: How many berry types does it take to make a uber-delicious smoothie?   A: 7
column6: Our Berry Bomb is a potent weapon. So tasty it will blow away your taste buds. We take lingonberries from Swedish forests then mix with strawberries, cranberries, blueberries, blackberries, raspberries, goji berries, acai berries. Exploding with nutrients to keep you feeling (and looking awesome)!
column7: Yoggie founder Charlie's favourite. "Lingonberries are so good for you and were my favourite food as a child. I'm half-Swedish and used to pick them in Swedish forests with my Grandmother. We source our lingonberries directly from Sweden and they make this smoothie taste extra special..."
column8: Berries have the highest concentration of goodness among fruits.
column9: The superfoods in this smoothie mix are known to help brain function, hormone balance and energy levels

column4: Banana, strawberries plus a few special titbits for extra gorgeousness
